content.query:
-- CREATE VIEW ZOAMTODATA
CREATE VIEW gold.zomatodata
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/zomatodata/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1

-- CREATE VIEW Zomato_country_data---
CREATE VIEW gold.zomato_country_data
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/zomato_country_data/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1

---CREATE VIEW resturent_count_country_data---
CREATE VIEW gold.resturent_count_country
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/resturent_count_country/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1


---CREATE VIEW resturent_count_city_data---
CREATE VIEW gold.resturent_count_city
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/resturent_count_city/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1


---CREATE VIEW price_range_data---
CREATE VIEW gold.price_range
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/price_range/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1


---CREATE VIEW merged_data---
CREATE VIEW gold.merged_data
AS
SELECT
*
FROM
OPENROWSET
(BULK 'https://zomatodl.blob.core.windows.net/silver/merged_data/', FORMAT='Parquet')
AS Quer1
